title: Twisted edge Laplacians on finite graphs from a K\"{a}hler structure
abstract:
In this paper we study a Kahler structure on finite points. In particular, we
study the edge Laplacian of a graph twisted by the Kahler structure introduced
in this paper. We also discuss a metric aspect from a twisted holomorphic
Dolbeault-Dirac spectral triple and show that the points have a finite diameter
with respect to Connes' distance.
